actions.name: Cross Counter

cost.trigger: The user is hit by a [Contact] attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a [Contact] attack.
Effect: The user takes 66% of the damage from the triggering Attack, then freely uses a [Punch] attack on its Active List.
